en.content: May seems to have no running water, but has supplied some in a ceramic jug. You freshen up at the washstand and go in. She cooks a hearty breakfast and leaves you in peace to eat. At about seven-thirty, you are paid up, packed, and ready to go. You bid May goodbye and she wishes you the best for your new career in Arkham.

zh.content: 梅的家里好像没有自来水，但有一个陶坛子，里面积了一些水。你在盥洗室梳洗一番，走进屋子里。梅又做了一顿丰盛的早餐，让你安心享用。差不多七点半的时候，你付了钱，打点好行李，准备继续上路。你向梅告别，她祝愿你在阿卡姆工作顺利。

text.en: If you succeeded at a Track roll last night, and wish to investigate the results further
text.zh: 如果你昨晚曾在「追踪」检定中成功过，并想进一步勘查后果
